item.description:
AMC Chestnut Hill 5
27 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill, MA

Movie starts at 5:40 PM
Meet inside lobby near screening theatre around 5:15
We'll go inside at 5:30.

Then a few minutes away, grab a bite at O'Hara's in Newton
Please let me know if you are doing both. I can call ahead for a table.
Great inexpensive food. They will be busy at 7:30 on a Sat. night.

http://www.oharas.us/...

O'Hara's Food & Spirit's
1185 Walnut St
Newton, MA 02461-1240
(617) 965-6785
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the theatre that is the screening for THE UGLY TRUTH

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: LAST MINUTE Movie** Movie & Casual Dinner after "THE UGLY TRUTH"
